com.google.gwt.search.client
Class SearchControl

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              com.google.gwt.search.client.SearchControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class SearchControl
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

Encapsulates the Google Ajax Search API search control.

Constructor Detail

SearchControl

public SearchControl(SearchControlOptions options)
Constructs a new SearchControl.

Parameters:
options - Provides a configuration for displaying and executing the SearchControl's searches
Method Detail

addKeepHandler

public void addKeepHandler(KeepHandler handler)
Adds a KeepHandler to the SearchControl. It is necessary to have set a keep label by invoking SearchControlOptions.setKeepLabel(java.lang.String) in order to display the keep link on the SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - A KeepHandler that will receive notifications when the user clicks on a keep link in the SearchControl

addSearchCompleteHandler

@Deprecated
public void addSearchCompleteHandler(SearchCompleteHandler handler)
Deprecated. use addSearchResultsHandler(SearchResultsHandler)

Adds a SearchCompleteHandler to receive notification of all search results loaded by the SearchControl. A SearchCompleteHandler added to the SearchControl will receive Result objects from all Search objects added to the SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - A SearchCompleteHandler that will receive notifications when the SearchControl has received a Result.

addSearchResultsHandler

public void addSearchResultsHandler(SearchResultsHandler handler)
Adds a SearchResultsHandler to receive notification of all search results loaded by the SearchControl. A SearchCompleteHandler added to the SearchControl will receive Result objects from all Search objects added to the SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - A SearchResultsHandler that will receive notifications when the SearchControl has received a Result.

addSearchStartingHandler

public void addSearchStartingHandler(SearchStartingHandler handler)
Adds a SearchStartingHandler to inform the search control that the caller would like to be notified when a search starts.

Parameters:
handler - a SearchStartingHandler that will receive notifications when the user invokes a search.

execute

public void execute(java.lang.String query)
Programmatically execute a query. This allows the control to be seeded with an initial query and search results. Using this method is equivalent to typing a query into the SearchControl and pressing return.

Parameters:
query - A search query

removeKeepHandler

public void removeKeepHandler(KeepHandler handler)
Removes a KeepHandler from the SearchControl. Removing all KeepHandlers will not remove the keep links from the displayed SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - The KeepHandler to remove

removeSearchCompleteHandler

@Deprecated
public void removeSearchCompleteHandler(SearchCompleteHandler handler)
Deprecated. 

Removes a SearchCompleteHandler from the SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - The SearchCompleteHandler to remove

removeSearchResultsHandler

public void removeSearchResultsHandler(SearchResultsHandler handler)
Removes a SearchResultsHandler from the SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - The SearchResultsHandler to remove

removeSearchStartingHandler

public void removeSearchStartingHandler(SearchStartingHandler handler)
Removes a SearchStartingHandler from the SearchControl.

Parameters:
handler - The SearchStartingHandler to remove
